backend/main.mo: Main canister implementing eBook store state, user/admin roles, and CRUD operations for profiles, products, orders, and submissions.
backend/migration.mo: Defines a migration that maps an empty old state to an empty new state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking features to files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for several frontend files used in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React frontend via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the application's React Router structure, including public pages and all admin routes.
frontend/src/components/admin/EBookAsset: Component for uploading eBook cover and PDF files with progress tracking and validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/EBookEdito: Form for creating or editing eBook metadata with validation and backend mutation calls.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Guards admin routes by checking Internet Identity authentication and admin status, showing login, loading, or access-denied UI as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with automatic session clearing and error handling.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactF: Implements a contact form that submits name, email, and message, showing success or error feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with links, social icons, branding credit, and a newsletter signup form.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Displays the site header with navigation, logo upload support, mobile menu, and login button.
frontend/src/components/newsletter/Newsl: Captures an email address and submits it to the newsletter subscription endpoint with validation and feedback.
frontend/src/components/payments/BuyButt: Starts a Stripe checkout session for an eBook purchase and redirects to the payment page.
Shows an eBook's cover, title, description, price, and includes a buy button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBranding.ts: Manages site logo branding via localStorage with load, update, and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes status flags and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates the page title and meta description using React effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods, including eBook CRUD, contact forms, newsletters, and business email.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteLinks.ts: Manages social link settings stored in localStorage with get and update helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Creates a Stripe checkout session via backend actor and returns session details through a mutation hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with founder info, mission, and values, and sets meta tags.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminContactMes: Shows contact form submissions with delete support and loading/empty states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin overview of sales, revenue, customers, products, and recent orders.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Provides admin panel layout with navigation, route guard, and content outlet.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNewsletter: Lists newsletter subscriber emails and allows exporting them to CSV.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrderDetai: Displays detailed order info including ebook, amount, status, and downloads.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Lists all orders in a table with basic details and links to order details pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Manages eBooks with listing, creation, editing, and asset uploads.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Admin page for updating business email, social links, and granting admin access via principal ID.
frontend/src/pages/admin/StripeSetupPage: Page to view Stripe config status and submit secret key and allowed countries to save Stripe settings.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays business contact info and a contact form, fetching email via React Query and setting meta tags.
frontend/src/pages/download/DownloadPage: Fetches an order and eBook, displays details, and triggers a PDF download while incrementing download count.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home page with hero content, mission overview, feature highlights, and navigation to the store.
frontend/src/pages/legal/PrivacyPolicyPa: Static privacy policy page describing data collection, usage, rights, and contact info.
frontend/src/pages/legal/RefundPolicyPag: Static refund policy page outlining refund conditions, exceptions, and request process.
frontend/src/pages/legal/TermsAndConditi: Static terms page covering usage rules, purchases, IP rights, liability, and contact info.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFailu: Displays payment failure notice with guidance and navigation links to store or support.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentSucce: Displays payment success, checks Stripe session status via actor, generates an order ID, and provides download and navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Displays all eBooks from the store, showing loading, empty, or grid views.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project configuration, requirements, existing features, issues, and rebuild instructions for the eBook store website.
